mapper.insert:
select if(max(contract_id) is null, 1, max(contract_id) + 1) as contractId from cms_contract
INSERT INTO cms_contract(contract_id, order_org_id, supply_org_id, receive_org_id, settle_org_id, resource_id, resource_quality,resource_date, contract_term, create_person, create_date, last_modify_person, last_modify_date, edit_type) VALUES(#{contractId}, #{orderOrgId}, #{supplyOrgId}, #{receiveOrgId}, #{settleOrgId}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceQuality}, #{resourceDate}, #{contractTerm}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW(), #{editType})

INSERT INTO cms_invoice(contract_id, invoice_quantity, invoice_unit_price, invoice_price, invoice_tax_percent, invoice_tax, invoice_total, create_person, create_date, last_modify_person, last_modify_date) VALUES (#{contractId}, #{invoiceQuantity}, #{invoiceUnitPrice}, #{invoicePrice}, #{invoiceTaxPercent}, #{invoiceTax}, #{invoiceTotal}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())

INSERT INTO base_org(org_id, org_name, org_address, org_phone, org_fax, org_represent, org_mail, org_bank, org_bank_account, create_person, create_date, last_modify_person, last_modify_date) VALUES (#{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{orgAddress}, #{orgPhone}, #{orgFax}, #{orgRepresent}, #{orgMail}, #{orgBank}, #{orgBankAccount}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())

INSERT INTO base_resource(resource_id, resource_name, resource_type, resource_spec, create_person, create_date, last_modify_person, last_modify_date) VALUES (#{resourceId}, #{resourceName}, #{resourceType}, #{resourceSpec}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bos.org_id AS supplyOrgId, bos.org_name AS supplyOrgName, boo.org_id AS orderOrgId, boo.org_name AS orderOrgName, bor.org_id AS receiveOrgId, bor.org_name AS receiveOrgName, bose.org_id AS settleOrgId, bose.org_name AS settleOrgName, br.resource_id AS resourceId, br.resource_name AS resourceName, cc.resource_quality AS resourceQuality, ci.invoice_unit_price AS invoiceUnitPrice, ci.invoice_price AS invoicePrice, ci.invoice_tax_percent AS invoiceTaxPercent, ci.invoice_tax AS invoiceTax, ci.invoice_total AS invoiceTotal FROM cms_contract cc LEFT JOIN base_org bos ON cc.supply_org_id = bos.org_id LEFT JOIN base_org boo ON cc.order_org_id = boo.org_id LEFT JOIN base_org bor ON cc.receive_org_id = bor.org_id LEFT JOIN base_org bose ON cc.settle_org_id = bose.org_id LEFT JOIN cms_invoice ci ON cc.contract_id = ci.contract_id LEFT JOIN base_resource br ON cc.resource_id = br.resource_id WHERE cc.contract_id = #{contractId}

SELECT bo.org_id AS orgId, bo.org_name AS orgName, bo.org_address AS orgAddress, bo.org_phone AS orgPhone, bo.org_fax AS orgFax, bo.org_mail AS orgMail, bo.org_bank AS orgBank, bo.org_bank_account AS orgBankAccount, bus.user_name AS orgRepresentName FROM base_org bo LEFT JOIN base_user bus ON bo.org_represent = bus.user_id WHERE bo.org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.sql: SELECT bo.org_id AS orgId, bo.org_name AS orgName, bo.org_address AS orgAddress, bo.org_phone AS orgPhone, bus.user_name AS orgRepresentName FROM base_org bo LEFT JOIN base_user bus ON bo.org_represent = bus.user_id
SELECT br.resource_id AS resourceId, br.resource_name AS resourceName, br.resource_type AS resourceType, br.resource_spec AS resourceSpec FROM base_resource br
mapper.select:
SELECT cc.contract_id AS contractId, bo.org_name AS orgName, br.resource_name AS resourceName, br.resource_spec AS resourceSpec, cc.resource_quality AS resourceQuality, ci.invoice_total AS invoiceTotal, DATE_FORMAT(cc.resource_date, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H点%i分') AS resourceDate, cc.edit_type AS editType FROM cms_contract cc LEFT JOIN base_org bo ON cc.supply_org_id = bo.org_id LEFT JOIN base_resource br ON cc.resource_id = br.resource_id LEFT JOIN cms_invoice ci ON cc.contract_id = ci.contract_id
limit #{start}, #{limit}

WHERE bo.org_name like concat('%', #{orgName}, '%')
